content: how many people in the picture?

The image features a woman sitting on a chair, playing the guitar while four children sit around her. Three of the children are holding toy instruments, including two drums and a keyboard, as they enjoy the music together. The scene appears to be set in a classroom or play area, with multiple chairs placed throughout the room. There is also a book visible on one of the chairs, suggesting that this could be an educational setting where children are learning about music or engaging in creative activities.
